OOC: Yeah but I would like to point out if Blacky did absorb the 
energy they could just have her blown up right there with it... heh 
Predacons and Maximals cant use the energy without causing alot of 
harm to themselves since they spark energy opposes chaochitan energy.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> You bet. Our (the council's) goal is to guard against moding, and 
that mostly happens with new weapons (that's why certain people are 
being bugged by us more than others). Mostly-storyline things (like 
reformatting Australia, which doesn't create a superweapon or 
anything, but creates an interesting area to RP in) are generally 
good.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Airshadow Nightlight <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> > 
> > That Mean that I can do that?!!!!!!
